item.name: Etched Cabernet Sauvignon Red Wine Bottle
item.description: Consider a distinguished gift that speaks volumes of quality and craftsmanship. This 750ml. cabernet sauvignon red wine bottle features deep hand etching and optional hand-painted color fills. With a proud 5-star rating for over 15 years, we are recognized as the highest-quality custom labeling and etching company in the industry. Each bottle is hand-crafted by artisans in our California facility, perfect for custom etching corporate logos and personalized text. Ideal for weddings, retirement celebrations, holidays, thank-you, or executive gifts. We carry all widely available name brand wines. See ordering guidelines for protective packaging pricing that will apply.
item.description_short: 750-milliliter cabernet sauvignon red wine bottle featuring deep hand etching with optional hand-painted color fills.

item.name: Etched Chardonnay White Wine Bottle
item.description: Convey your thanks with a tasteful gift. This 750ml. chardonnay white wine bottle, etched with optional color fills, is a testament to superior craftsmanship. Each bottle is carefully hand-crafted by artisans in our California facility, ensuring a unique and impressive presentation. Custom etch corporate logos and personalized messages for weddings, retirements, birthday parties, and sales celebrations. Perfect for holiday, thank you, or executive gifts, this bottle adds a refined touch to any event. We carry all widely available name brand wines. See ordering guidelines for protective packaging pricing that will apply.

item.name: Etched Pinot Noir Red Wine Bottle
item.description: Mark a big milestone with this 750ml California pinot noir bottle. This item uses deep hand etching and optional hand-painted color fills, exemplifying superior craftsmanship. With a 5-star rating maintained, this product is ideal for corporate gifting, employee appreciation, milestones, and special occasions. Each bottle is carefully hand-crafted by artisans in a California facility.
item.description_short: 750ml California pinot noir bottle featuring deep hand etching and optional hand-painted color fills, exemplifying superior craftsmanship.

item.name: Etched Coppola Diamond Cabernet Red Wine Bottle
item.description: This 750ml Coppola cabernet bottle offers a powerfully complex wine with a classic flavor profile and youthful maturity. This sophisticated bottle is deeply hand-etched and hand-painted, featuring a one-color fill. The etched red wine bottle, containing cabernet wine, is an excellent choice for holiday, thank you, or executive gifts. The intricate craftsmanship and elegant presentation make it a distinguished and unforgettable gift option.

item.name: Etched Duckhorn Decoy Cabernet Red Wine Bottle
item.description: For a distinguished gift or a refined addition to any event, this 750 ml. Duckhorn cabernet sauvignon bottle is an excellent choice. From its deep, inviting color to the enticing aromas of blackberry, currant, and cocoa, this wine exemplifies the best of Sonoma County cabernet sauvignon. The lush fruit flavors on the palate are complemented by rich tannins and hints of sweet oak and spice. Each bottle is deep etched and hand-painted, including one color fill, making it the perfect corporate gift.
item.description_short: 750-milliliter Duckhorn cabernet sauvignon bottle with imprint options.

item.name: Etched Jordan Cabernet Alexander Valley Red Wine Bottle
item.description: Embark on a sensory journey with this unforgettable 750ml Jordan Alexander cabernet bottle, a wine that captivates with its intricate and vibrant scent of red plum, anise, cherry, violets, and tobacco, enriched by black currant, dried herbs, toasted oak, and cocoa. Upon tasting it, your palate is graced with an elegant and supple texture, revealing generous flavors of sweet plum and dark cherry, accented by vanilla and mocha. Silky tannins and a harmonious structure linger in the finish. This bottle, deep hand-etched and hand-painted with one color fill, is perfect for holidays, thank-you, or executive gifts.
item.description_short: 750-milliliter Jordan Alexander cabernet bottle with deep hand-etched and hand-painted imprint options, perfect for holidays, thank-you, or executive gifts.
